name: Wolf Run Golf Club
description: The Grill at Wolf Run offers impeccable service and outstanding food for golfers or anyone who enjoys a relaxed atmosphere in a convenient location. With a wide range of indoor and outdoor facility space that accommodates from 10-250 people, Wolf Run is the perfect location for monthly meetings, anniversaries, birthday parties, weddings and much more!

faqs.question: What’s included in a Wolf Run golf group package?
faqs.answer: Lodging, pre-booked tee times at Wolf Run, carts, and concierge planning. Add transportation, dining, and multi-course options.

faqs.question: How much do Wolf Run group packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typically $199–$399 per golfer depending on season, lodging, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—tee sheets, lodging blocks, banquets, tournament setup, and transportation can be arranged.

facilities: Driving Range With a 100-yard Short Game Area
pointOfView: No other Reno area golf course offers such a challenge, with rewarding beauty and serenity no matter how you score. You'll get lost in the views of the surrounding mountain tops and eastward across the Washoe Valley. Meandering streams and elevation changes make for some nervous shot-making, but forced carries are few from forward tee boxes if distance is not a strength of your game. There is always a ready beverage cart and a full-service bar and restaurant to help elevate your joy as well.

Play Wolf Run in Reno with golf groups, tee times, and stay and play packages. Trusted trip planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure groups.

Wolf Run Golf Club’s championship layout course offers an enjoyable challenge for any golfer. The course exists harmoniously with the surrounding landscape of native flora; a unique combination that results in a memorable playing experience.

The facilities include a practice putting green, beautiful chipping green with patio seating and recently remodeled driving range with a 100-yard short game area, making Wolf Run the perfect location for a golf outing of any size. On and off the course Wolf Run offers the total experience to golfers and non- golfers.

featuredHole.title: Hole #16 — Par 3
featuredHole.description: A dramatic downhill par 3 with Thomas Creek running along the left side. Club selection is everything here — the green sits below you with bunkers guarding the front. Take one extra club and trust it.

testimonials.quote: Wolf Run Golf Club was the highlight of our Reno, NV golf trip. Fairways were immaculate, pace of play was great, and the staff treated our group like VIPs. Golf the High Sierra nailed the tee time spacing for us.

testimonials.quote: We've done golf trips all over the West, and Wolf Run Golf Club is now a permanent stop. The condition was pristine, greens rolled true, and the mountain views are unmatched. GTHS set up our tee times perfectly.

testimonials.quote: Played Wolf Run Golf Club with our group and it was incredible. The John Fleming design keeps you thinking on every shot. Easily one of the best courses in Reno, NV.
